song.eTitle: Hail Him the King of Glory

verses.verse: Tell it to every kindred and nation, Tell it far and near; Earth's darkest night will fade with the dawning, Jesus will soon appear.
verses.refrain: Hail Him the King of glory, Once the Lamb for sinners slain; Tell, tell the wondrous story, "Jesus comes to reign."
verses.verse: Nations again in strife and commotion, Warnings by the way; Signs in the heavens, unerring omens, Herald the glorious day.
